EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
1. VESSEL, NUMEROUS PERSONS ON BOARD, REQUESTING
   ASSISTANCE IN 33-08N 012-46E. VESSELS IN
   VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
   ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
   INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 3906 5908 4527,
   3906 5908 4409, FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
   E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1097/17.
